devdoc.details: Uses OpenZeppelin's SignedSafeMath and DSMath's WAD for calculations. Change log: - Move view functinos (quotes, high cov ratio fee) from the Pool contract to this contract - Add quote functions for cross chain swaps

returns.actualToAmount: The actual amount user would receive
returns.haircut: The haircut that will be applied

quoteSwapTokensForCredit(IAsset,uint256,.details: reverse quote is not supported haircut is calculated in the fromToken when swapping tokens for credit

params.asset: The asset willing to be withdrawn
params.liquidity: The liquidity willing to be withdrawn

returns.amount: Total amount to be withdrawn from Pool
returns.liabilityToBurn: Total liability to be burned by Pool

params.Dx: delta x, i.e. token x amount inputted

returns.quote: The quote for amount of token y swapped for token x amount inputted

withdrawalAmountImpl(int256,int256,int25.details: Calculate the withdrawal amount for any r*

withdrawalAmountInEquilImpl(int256,int25.details: should be used only when r* = 1

devdoc.title: CoreV3

exactDepositLiquidityImpl(int256,int256,.notice: return the deposit reward in token amount when target liquidity (LP amount) is known

exactDepositLiquidityInEquilImpl(int256,.notice: return the deposit reward in token amount when target liquidity (LP amount) is known

quoteDepositLiquidity(IAsset,uint256,uin.notice: This function calculate the exactly amount of liquidity of the deposit. Assumes r* = 1

quoteSwap(IAsset,IAsset,int256,uint256,u.notice: Quotes the actual amount user would receive in a swap, taking in account slippage and haircut

quoteWithdrawAmount(IAsset,uint256,uint2.notice: Calculates fee and liability to burn in case of withdrawal

swapFromCreditQuote(int256,int256,int256.notice: quote swapping from credit for tokens

swapToCreditQuote(int256,int256,int256,i.notice: quote swapping from tokens for credit

userdoc.notice: Handles math operations of Wombat protocol. Assume all params are signed integer with 18 decimals
